gestureOverwriteConfirm.description: Confirmation message when adding a duplicate gesture

reducedMotionWarning.description: Warning message when system reduced motion is enabled

tutorialPinHint.description: Hint to pin the extension in tutorial step 4. Do not add space around icon.
